body:
Your code comment states you're storing a map, yet your code stores an Element. It should not be a surprise that an Element is not a map.

See the docs for http://www.ehcache.org/apidocs/3.1.3/org/ehcache/Cache.html#put-K-V-, they're pretty clear:

cache.put("myMap", map);

I'm not actually entirely sure how your code compiled. There does not appear to be a version of put that takes a single parameter.
title: incompatible type exception while getting Map object
